change.item: This resource was modified by the ArchivesSpace Preprocessor developed by the Harvard Library (https://github.com/harvard-library/archivesspace-preprocessor)

repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: These materials include handwritten accounts of organizing activities in NYS as well as newspaper clippings, organizing leaflets, broadsides, arm bands for strikers, song sheets and correspondence.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: These materials include handwritten accounts of organizing activities in NYS as well as newspaper clippings, organizing leaflets, broadsides, arm bands for strikers, song sheets and correspondence.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: ACWA Organizer Ida Alter Diaries #5670. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: Scrapbook of pamphlets, news clippings, and memorabilia
Scrapbook of pamphlets, news clippings, and memorabilia
